name: Polaris Training Program
description:
Welcome to our Polaris Training Program!

Intro:

With the Polaris Training Program (PTP) we allow both rookie and senior pilots of our crew to practice with our latest luxury space liner fleet in a virtual simulation.

Everything to let our dearest customers to enjoy their travels in the most comfortable and safe environment possible.

Controls:

Keep thrusters level in the middle with Q, W, E, A, S, D.

Mantain good pressure with SPACE.

Keep the ship straight with Arrow keys (Since some keyboard may have problems on multiple press with the arrows to I, J, K, L are also available).

Made for the Jam Trijam 121: Spacetime!
